R

readFileFromSocket(DataInputStream, OutputStream) - Static method in class it.azraelsec.Protocol.Communication
Reads a file from a DataInputStream using the same approach used for the String objects transferring, so sending the buffer size before as an integer data type.
receive(DataInputStream, DataOutputStream, Map<Commands, Execution>) - Static method in class it.azraelsec.Protocol.Communication
Receives a Commands requests, handles it using the dispatcher pointed out as argument and sends the result back through a Commands instance.
receiveAndSendStream(DataInputStream, DataOutputStream, InputStream) - Static method in class it.azraelsec.Protocol.Communication
Receives a Commands and sends a stream back.
register(String, String) - Method in interface it.azraelsec.Protocol.RemoteRegistration
Execute the remote RMI method for registering a new user and creating its related User object.
register(String, String) - Method in class it.azraelsec.Server.RegistrationStub
Offers a remote RMI interface to register new users using their username and password.
RegistrationStub - Class in it.azraelsec.Server
The RegistrationStub class is a RMI Stub that allows the remote RMI client to interact with the register method and to insert this way a new User object into the UsersDB instance.
RemoteRegistration - Interface in it.azraelsec.Protocol
The RemoteRegistration interface represents the remote interface to interact with the remote RMI stub.
Result - Interface in it.azraelsec.Protocol
The Result interface is implemented by the class that represents a back channel useful for the entity that sends a result back depending on an execution response.
run() - Method in class it.azraelsec.Chat.MessageReceiver
It is the main method in which is executed all the thread control logic.
run() - Method in class it.azraelsec.Notification.NotificationClientThread
Activates the Thread, making it serving the new incoming connections and handling their requests.
run() - Method in class it.azraelsec.Notification.NotificationServerThread
Activates the Thread, making it to fetch for new notifications.
run(Object[], Result) - Method in interface it.azraelsec.Protocol.Execution
 
run(Object[], Result) - Method in class it.azraelsec.Protocol.ExecutionImpl
 
run() - Method in class it.azraelsec.Server.TCPRequestHandler
Receives Commands requests within a loop and manage them though the related handlers.
